snippet: A contract was finally awarded for construction on the long-delayed second major venue complex for the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.
abstract: Contract is finally awarded for construction on the long-delayed second major venue complex for the 2016 Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro.
lead_paragraph: A contract was finally awarded for construction on the long-delayed second major venue complex for the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.main: Contract Awarded for Construction of Olympic Venue in Rio de Janeiro
